Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Whoa, whoa, whoa... Wait a second. This was your idea, Lucia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Sigh... This is turning into a disaster.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I regret having her help...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "TA-DA! Whatcha think? Here's my one-of-kind, super-duper, most prettiest Christmas tree in the whole wide world. Who'd say no to this?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Scoot over, you two! Give my Super Christmas Tree some time in the limelight.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A Christmas tree decorated with all sorts of parts and equipment appears before them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Watanabe's belt... You ran off to the Forsaken Camp, then came right back?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Bianca's hat... You didn't steal all of this... Did you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nope, nope! I just... borrowed them. They've got extras just sittin' around. It'd be a shame to just let them go to waste! Look! I also brought one of your jackets, Lee!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And my scarf...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "And even Kamui's headphones...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hehe, and I had Karenina's scarf from earlier!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But wait! I got a bunch of the commandant's clothes, too!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Are you really sure this okay? I\'m sure the commandant\'s going to go ballistic after seeing this... um... "Super Christmas Tree"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's not like we have time to find any other ornaments. This is all we got...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I guess there's nothing to be afraid of... Right...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Well, if you think about it from another point of view... She might still be surprised.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's the thought that counts. As long as Liv is happy, I'm sure the commandant won't mind.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You\'re right. After all, the commandant has always been understanding. I don\'t think Nanami\'s "surprise" will disappoint.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Besides, I think the commandant means the most to Liv.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I hope she gets the sentiment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Considering this is what we've been building up to.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Got that right! That's what I was thinking! You're all the best! So I like that there's a little bit of all of us hanging on the tree!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I made this tree hoping Liv likes it, so there's no way she won't!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's about time. Let's go.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory101.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Today's been great. I can't remember the last time I saw snow.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Thank you so much, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forget something, Liv?', 3: '60', 4: "Today's an important day.", 5: '60'}
{2: 'Close your eyes.', 3: '63'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'O-okay... What are you doing?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Open your eyes.', 3: '66'}
{2: "It's a Christmas tree.", 3: '69', 4: 'Nanami decorated it herself.', 5: '69'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Nanami slowly scoots the tree in front of Liv.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '...Yes. By definition, it is, in fact, a Christmas tree.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It might be a bit rough around the edges, but we hope you like it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "(Tears up) You guys... Everyone... So that's what you've been up to.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Tonight is Gray Raven's first Christmas Eve.", 3: '84', 4: "Let's enjoy it together.", 5: '84'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm just relieved you like the Christmas Tree, Commandant.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Not only that, I think our ability to work as a team in battle will be better now.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Sure wasn't easy, though...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Yippie! Looks like my Super Christmas Tree is making you blush, Liv! You like it, don'tcha?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Yes, I really do! I'm so happy to receive such an amazing gift, Nanami.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I think this turned out to be a really great team exercise.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "At least it wasn't all for nothing. It means a lot to put a smile on your face, Liv.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Alight, alright! Livy, Liv! Time for you to tell us how you feel! Make way, everybody! Move it or lose it!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'So... How do you feel after seeing the Super Christmas Tree?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'How do I feel? I feel surprised. And happy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Yeah... But just one more thingâ€”', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Next time, can you not mix everyone's stuff with all that candy...", 4: '1'}
{2: "...Couldn't you have at least left my stuff alone?", 3: '108', 4: 'I second the motion...', 5: '108'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Relax, Commandant!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'So the commandant DOES care after all...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'But I heard you have to cover the Christmas tree with candy all the way to the tippy-top! Only then is it a REAL Christmas tree!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You're right. Good job, Nanami... I really like the Christmas tree and the commandant's... ornaments.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But considering all the hard work everyone put in getting ready for the holiday, I'm the only one who gets to enjoy the surprise. I'd rather...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'd rather work together with everyone so we can all enjoy Christmas.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Sorry, I know it sounds childish... But that's how I really feel.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I want us to get ready for Christmas together. That way all of us can enjoy the holiday!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "(Whimper) You're so amazing, Liv! I think I'm gonna cry!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "That sure is something only you would say, Liv. Well, Christmas isn't over yet.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Looks like there aren't enough lights on the tree. What should we do, Commandant?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gray Raven, Liv, time to initiate Operation Christmas! Give it your all!', 3: '127'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "O-okay, Commandant! I'll do my best!", 4: '1'}
